trans-unit.source: Hourly land-based weather observations from NOAA (merged data from 201304 to 201310).
trans-unit.target: Hourly land-based weather observations from NOAA (merged data from 201304 to 201310).

trans-unit.source: The weather data covers observations made from airport weather stations, covering the time period April-October 2013.
trans-unit.target: The weather data covers observations made from airport weather stations, covering the time period April-October 2013.

trans-unit.source: Before uploading to Azure ML Studio, the dataset was processed as follows:
trans-unit.target: Before uploading to Azure ML Studio, the dataset was processed as follows:

trans-unit.source: Weather station IDs were mapped to corresponding airport IDs
trans-unit.target: Weather station IDs were mapped to corresponding airport IDs

trans-unit.source: Weather stations not associated with the 70 busiest airports were filtered out
trans-unit.target: Weather stations not associated with the 70 busiest airports were filtered out

trans-unit.source: The Date column was split into separate Year, Month, and Day columns
trans-unit.target: The Date column was split into separate Year, Month, and Day columns

trans-unit.source: The following columns were selected: AirportID, Year, Month, Day, Time, TimeZone, SkyCondition, Visibility, WeatherType, DryBulbFarenheit, DryBulbCelsius, WetBulbFarenheit, WetBulbCelsius, DewPointFarenheit, DewPointCelsius, RelativeHumidity, WindSpeed, WindDirection, ValueForWindCharacter, StationPressure, PressureTendency, PressureChange, SeaLevelPressure, RecordType, HourlyPrecip, Altimeter
trans-unit.target: The following columns were selected: AirportID, Year, Month, Day, Time, TimeZone, SkyCondition, Visibility, WeatherType, DryBulbFarenheit, DryBulbCelsius, WetBulbFarenheit, WetBulbCelsius, DewPointFarenheit, DewPointCelsius, RelativeHumidity, WindSpeed, WindDirection, ValueForWindCharacter, StationPressure, PressureTendency, PressureChange, SeaLevelPressure, RecordType, HourlyPrecip, Altimeter
